name: SoulBinder
description:
GOAL

Bring all the souls/gravestones back to the portals. Move them by bonding with them. An indicator shows when you can make a bond.

CONTROLS

  • Arrow  keys - Move around
  • W,A,S,D - Bond with a soul in an orthogonal line
  • Tab - Switch position with a soul
  • X - Break a bond
  • R - Restart a level

CREDITS

Created by Arjen K. in Godot Engine 3.3.2.

MUSIC

  • Lex Villena - Dissonance
  • Lex Villena - Thoughtful Seven

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/lex-villena
